decision_conditions:
The Development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 18(a) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended.

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10.5pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Prior to the commencement of development, details of all replacement sash windows, including a 1:20 scale elevation drawing of each window type showing the glazing pattern and lintels, and 1:5 scale vertical and horizontal cross section drawings showing the upper and lower stiles, the meeting rails, the dimensions of the glazing and the profile and dimensions of the glazing bars and spacers (if any) shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.&nbsp; The works shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the approved details.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-6552a8b9-7fff-40c3-5e2a-26758adcaf33"><br><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10.5pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">REASON: To preserve or enhance the character and appearance of the conservation area.&nbsp;</span></span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.656;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The proposed roof lights shall be of a conservation range specification.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-ff411d8c-7fff-56e6-9375-ac383eb14a7b"><br><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.656;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To preserve or enhance the character and appearance of the conservation area.&nbsp;</span></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-6b386a51-7fff-d09b-f4a5-380aff0e0a9a"></span></p><div><span id="docs-internal-guid-22f957c6-7fff-a112-8092-0511692525c7"><p>Prior to commencement of development, specification details of the proposed bike locker to be sited at the front of the site shall be submitted to the local planning authority for written approval.&nbsp; &nbsp;The approved scheme shall subsequently be implemented prior to first occupation of development.</p><p><br></p><p>REASON:&nbsp; To preserve the character and appearance of the conservation area.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p></span></div>

<p>Prior to commencement of development, specification details of the proposed screening hedge to be planted at the front of the site between the existing frontage boundary railings and the proposed bike locker shall be submitted to the local planning authority for written approval.&nbsp; &nbsp;The approved scheme shall subsequently be implemented in the first recognised planting season following completion of the development and shall be maintained in perpetuity thereafter.&nbsp; &nbsp;Should the hedge become diseased or should die within the first three years of planting,&nbsp; a replacement hedge of the same or similar species shall be planted in the same position to serve the same purpose.</p><p><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; line-height: 1.28;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;"></span></p><p>REASON:&nbsp; To preserve the character and appearance of the conservation area.&nbsp;</p>

<p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; line-height: 1.28;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Prior to the commencement of the relevant part of the work, the applicant shall submit, and have approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority, a detailed layout, cross sections (scale 1:20), full specifications and a detailed management and maintenance plan of the biodiverse roof for the proposed extension with a minimum substrate depth of 80mm, not including the vegetative mat.&nbsp; Further details associated with the green wall shall also be submitted.&nbsp; The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved and shall be fully implemented before the development is first occupied.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; line-height: 1.28;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 6pt; line-height: 1.28;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; font-variant-emoji: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">REASON:  </span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">To reduce surface water run-off rates from the development give t</span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10.5pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">he site is shown to have a medium risk of surface water flooding. </span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.28;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The development shall be implemented in accordance with the energy improvement measures identified within the Design and Access Statement accompanying the application.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.656;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.28;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:6pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To reduce carbon emissions and overheating for the development to address climate change.&nbsp;</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.656;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Noise levels from the proposed Air Source Heat Pump (ASHP) for the development </span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">when operational </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 10.5pt; white-space-collapse: preserve;">shall at all times remain no greater than 40dB(A) when measured at any nearby residential window or other sensitive receptor adjoining the site.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.656;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-a5b2a0fe-7fff-8b16-f31b-12a21b959631"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.656;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:10.5pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that occupiers of neighbouring properties do not suffer a loss of amenity by reason of noise nuisance </span><span style="white-space-collapse: preserve; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">from the proposed ASHP siting.</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<p>Prior to commencement of development, details of the enclosure to house the proposed outdoor ASHP shall be submitted to the local planning authority for written approval.&nbsp; The approved scheme of details shall subsequently be implemented prior to first occupation of the approved development.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">REASON: To ensure that occupiers of neighbouring properties do not suffer a loss of amenity by reason of noise nuisance from the proposed ASHP siting.</span>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

<p>Prior to commencement of development, a preliminary UXO survey shall be undertaken of the site, and the results provided to the main contractor responsible for Health &amp; Safety matters on and off-site under the CDM Regs 2015, and a copy of which shall be sent to the LPA for their records.</p><p><br></p><p>REASON: In the interests of health and safety.&nbsp;</p>
description: Alterations and extensions comprising lower ground floor rear infill extension, rear dormer loft extension, 3 no. roof windows and replacement of sash windows throughout.  Bike store to be introduced at front of property behind existing fence line, together with new frontage planting.  New air source heat pump with timber enclosure to be introduced in rear garden.  Garden to undergo new planting and landscaping throughout.
application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
